statements.select: select tb_sc_ID, tb_sc_ftime, tb_sc_etime, tb_sc_czrgh, tb_sc_gxbs, tb_sc_dh, tb_sc_isEnd, tb_sc_bz from tb_sc where tb_sc_ID = $value$
select tb_sc_ID, tb_sc_ftime, tb_sc_etime, tb_sc_czrgh, tb_sc_gxbs, tb_sc_dh, tb_sc_isEnd, tb_sc_bz from tb_sc
select tb_sc_ID, tb_sc_ftime, tb_sc_etime, tb_sc_czrgh, tb_sc_gxbs, tb_sc_dh, tb_sc_isEnd, tb_sc_bz from tb_sc
statements.insert:
insert into tb_sc ( tb_sc_ftime, tb_sc_etime, tb_sc_czrgh, tb_sc_gxbs, tb_sc_dh, tb_sc_isEnd, tb_sc_bz ) values ( #tb_sc_ftime#, #tb_sc_etime#, #tb_sc_czrgh#, #tb_sc_gxbs#, #tb_sc_dh#, #tb_sc_isEnd#, #tb_sc_bz# )
select @@IDENTITY as value
statements.update:
update tb_sc set
tb_sc_ftime = #tb_sc_ftime#,
tb_sc_etime = #tb_sc_etime#,
tb_sc_czrgh = #tb_sc_czrgh#,
tb_sc_gxbs = #tb_sc_gxbs#,
tb_sc_dh = #tb_sc_dh#,
tb_sc_isEnd = #tb_sc_isEnd#,
tb_sc_bz = #tb_sc_bz#,
where tb_sc_ID = $tb_sc_ID$
